item.title: [PHP] RuneScape Combat Algorithm?
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:363842”]$warrior_level = (1 / 4) * ((13 / 10) * ($attack + $strength) + $defence + $hitpoints + ((1 / 2) * $prayer));

Was that so damn hard? Do you not know how to read and write a formula? Its the same idea for the others…[/quote]
I could read it fine, it’s just the parenthesis that kept throwing me off.
Thanks though.

item.title: [PHP] RuneScape Combat Algorithm?
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

I have come across three algorithms used to calculate RuneScape’s combat level, and I am using it for a signature-creator, which I made in PHP.

How would I go about adding these three formulas, to one equation, in PHP?

[hr]

EDIT:

Attempt at the melee code:

function calculateCombat() {
	$melee = ($attack + $strength + $defence);
	$attstr = ($attack + $strenth);
	if(($melee)/3 > $magic || ($melee)/3 > $range) {
		$combat1 = ($melee)/4 * ((13/10)*($attstr)) + $defence + $hitpoints + (($prayer)/2);
		return $combat1;
	}
}

It doesn’t echo any numbers at all. :S

Read full topic
